oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grass-endophytes in plant protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Saikkonen, Kari
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Agriculturists have long known that certain grass species infected with systemic fungal endophytes are highly resistant to both vertebrate and invertebrate herbivores.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Saikkonen, Kari (2009) Grass-endophytes in plant protection. Paper at: Ecology in a changing climate : the 10th international congress of ecology, Brisbane, Australia, 16-21 August 2009.
